hReview 2 - Extracting item hCard test

This page was designed to test the extraction of an hCard from the item of hreview.

Inspired by: Glenn Jones' Microformat Test Suite

Author: Lawrence Woodman (vLife Systems)

Tests

Test Result Comment
hreview[0].item.fn IsEqualTo("Crepes on Cole") fn is a singular value
hreview[0].org[0].organization_name IsEqualTo("Crepes on Cole") organization_name is a singular value
hreview[0].adr[0].locality IsEqualTo("San Francisco") locality is a singular value

Crepes on Cole is awesome

Rated 5 out of 5 by Tantek - April 18, 2005

Crepes on Cole is one of the best little creperies in San Francisco. Excellent food and service. Plenty of tables in a variety of sizes for parties large and small.
